src_text: omi a meetse ka go a seket a ka ge naga e sa t wela pele go itemogela komelel Go sa balwe dipula t e di sa t wago go na, maemo a matamo nageng ka bophara a t wela pele go phuhlam Se ke ka lebaka la dithempheret ha t a godimo gammogo le gore ga se ra hlwa re eba le dipula t e di nago nako le nakKabinete e hlohlelet wa ke ditheri ano t e di t welago pele le mebasepala ye e tsenego dikolotong kudu ka nepo ya go hwet a tharollo ya dikoloto t a mebasepal Melaokakanywa20.
trg_text: Upcoming EventsCommemoration of Nelson MandelaCabinet joins South Africans in commemorating the fourth anniversary of Nelson Mandela's passing on 5 December 2013.

src_text: Kabinete e dumelet e go romelwa ga Melaokakanywa ye e latelago Palamenteng:2 Molaokakanywapheto wa wa Thu o ya t a Leago wa 2017Molaokakanywa wo o hlagi a dikholego t e di kaonafet ego mabapi le dit helete t a mmu o t a kgodi o ya bana go bana bao ba hlokofalet wego ke batswadi le bao ba lego kotsing, go akaret wa bao ba dulago ka malapeng ao a hlokomet wego ke banaMolaokakanywa wa Ba omi ba Dintlo wa 2017Molaokakanywa wo o fedi a Molao wa bjale wa Merero ya t a Dintlo wa 1976 (Molao wa 112 wa 1976).

src_text: O hloma seemo seo se kgont hago sa taolo go maatlafat a tiragalo ya ekonomi ka intastering ya dintlo mola ka go le lengwe o rarolla tlhokego ya go netefat a gore go ba le phetogo ka lefapheng leMolaokakanywapheto wa wa Tlhako ya Mangwalo a Dithuto a Boset haba (NQF) wa 2016Molaokakanywa wo o maatlafat a Molao wa Bjale wa NQF wa 2008 (Molao wa 67 wa 2008).
